page.title: 05AN URCHFONT CHILD
page.content: CLAIRE IS 12 YEARS OLD AND HAS JUST LEFT URCHFONT VILLAGE SCHOOL TO ATTEND LAVINGTON COMPREHENSIVE SCHOOL. SHE HAS LIVED IN URCHFONT FOR 6 YEARS AND FINDS IT A BUSY FRIENDLY VILLAGE. CLAIRE IS A GIRL GUIDE,SHE ALSO GOES TO THE YOUTH CLUB AND THE GOD SQUAD (A LOCAL CHRISTIAN YOUTH GROUP). CLAIRE LIKES ROLLER-SKATING WATCHING TELEVISION AND WALKING IN THE COUNTRY AROUND HER VILLAGE. HER HOBBIES ARE BIRD-WATCHING, COLLECTING SHELLS, HER PET CAT AND GIRL GUIDES. THIS SUMMER THE GIRL GUIDES WERE 75 YEARS OLD AND HELD A SPECIAL CAMP TO CELEBRATE THIS. URCHFONT VILLAGE HAS MANY ACTIVITIES FOR YOUNG PEOPLE INCLUDING A RECREATION FIELD, TENNIS COURTS AND A TRACK FOR CYCLING ON BMX BICYCLES.
